sn35.102:1.2: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.6: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.9: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn35.102:1.12: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.15: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.102:1.16: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na tumhakam.
sn35.102:1.18: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.19: Yampi, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
sn35.102:1.20: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati”ti.
